languages.text: "Признаться честно, Ваша Светлость, она производит на меня самое удручающее впечатление. Разумеется, я ни в коей мере не оспариваю мудрость госпожи губернатора — кому, как не ей, видеть истинную меру индивида, даже если этот индивид — мутант..."

"To be honest, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I find her presence most distressing. Of course, I would never gainsay the wisdom of the governor. Who if not she could perceive the true worth of a person, even if that person is a mutant?"
languages.original_text: "Признаться честно, Ваша Светлость, она производит на меня самое удручающее впечатление. Разумеется, я ни в коей мере не оспариваю мудрость госпожи губернатора — кому, как не ей, видеть истинную меру индивида, даже если этот индивид — мутант..."

traits.locale_text: "To be honest, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I find her presence most distressing. Of course, I would never gainsay the wisdom of the governor. Who if not she could perceive the true worth of a person, even if that person is a mutant?"

"To be honest, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I find her presence most distressing. Of course, I would never gainsay the wisdom of the governor. Who if not she could perceive the true worth of a person, even if that person is a mutant?"

"To be honest, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I find her presence most distressing. Of course, I would never gainsay the wisdom of the governor. Who if not she could perceive the true worth of a person, even if that person is a mutant?"

"To be honest, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I find her presence most distressing. Of course, I would never gainsay the wisdom of the governor. Who if not she could perceive the true worth of a person, even if that person is a mutant?"

languages.text: “老实说，大人，我觉得她的存在非常令人苦恼。当然，我绝对不会怀疑总督的智慧。除了她之外，还有谁能察觉到人们真正的价值呢？即便对方是变种人，她也一视同仁。”
languages.original_text: "To be honest, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I find her presence most distressing. Of course, I would never gainsay the wisdom of the governor. Who if not she could perceive the true worth of a person, even if that person is a mutant?"

traits.locale_text: “老实说，大人，我觉得她的存在非常令人苦恼。当然，我绝对不会怀疑总督的智慧。除了她之外，还有谁能察觉到人们真正的价值呢？即便对方是变种人，她也一视同仁。”

languages.text: «A decir verdad, mi{mf|lord|lady}, su presencia me resulta extremadamente inquietante. Pero, por supuesto, nunca contradiría la sabiduría de la gobernadora. ¿Quién si no ella podría discernir el verdadero valor de una persona, aunque sea mutante?».
languages.original_text: "To be honest, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I find her presence most distressing. Of course, I would never gainsay the wisdom of the governor. Who if not she could perceive the true worth of a person, even if that person is a mutant?"

traits.locale_text: «A decir verdad, mi{mf|lord|lady}, su presencia me resulta extremadamente inquietante. Pero, por supuesto, nunca contradiría la sabiduría de la gobernadora. ¿Quién si no ella podría discernir el verdadero valor de una persona, aunque sea mutante?».

languages.text: 「陛下、正直に申し上げますと、ユリエットの存在は最も悩ましいものだと考えています。もちろん、総督の英知を否定するつもりはありません。変異体であろうと、総督にも真価を見極められない人物なら、私が知る由もありません」
languages.original_text: "To be honest, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I find her presence most distressing. Of course, I would never gainsay the wisdom of the governor. Who if not she could perceive the true worth of a person, even if that person is a mutant?"

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、正直に申し上げますと、ユリエットの存在は最も悩ましいものだと考えています。もちろん、総督の英知を否定するつもりはありません。変異体であろうと、総督にも真価を見極められない人物なら、私が知る由もありません」

languages.text: "Ganz ehrlich, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ich finde ihre Anwesenheit überaus beunruhigend. Natürlich würde ich niemals der Weisheit der Gouverneurin widersprechen. Wer, wenn nicht sie, sollte den wahren Wert einer Person erkennen, selbst wenn diese Person eine Mutantin ist?"
languages.original_text: "To be honest, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I find her presence most distressing. Of course, I would never gainsay the wisdom of the governor. Who if not she could perceive the true worth of a person, even if that person is a mutant?"

traits.locale_text: "Ganz ehrlich, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ich finde ihre Anwesenheit überaus beunruhigend. Natürlich würde ich niemals der Weisheit der Gouverneurin widersprechen. Wer, wenn nicht sie, sollte den wahren Wert einer Person erkennen, selbst wenn diese Person eine Mutantin ist?"

languages.text: « En toute honnêteté, Votre Seigneurie, je trouve sa présence angoissante, mais il va de soi que je ne remettrais jamais en question la sagesse de la gouverneure. Personne n'est plus capable qu'elle de percevoir la véritable valeur des gens, les mutants y compris. »
languages.original_text: "To be honest, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I find her presence most distressing. Of course, I would never gainsay the wisdom of the governor. Who if not she could perceive the true worth of a person, even if that person is a mutant?"

traits.locale_text: « En toute honnêteté, Votre Seigneurie, je trouve sa présence angoissante, mais il va de soi que je ne remettrais jamais en question la sagesse de la gouverneure. Personne n'est plus capable qu'elle de percevoir la véritable valeur des gens, les mutants y compris. »

languages.text: "Dürüst olmak gerekirse varlığından pek hazzetmiyorum {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Lakin valinin hikmetine de sual edecek değilim. Mutant olsun ya da olmasın, bir kişinin gerçek değerini valimizden daha iyi kim bilecek?"
languages.original_text: "To be honest, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I find her presence most distressing. Of course, I would never gainsay the wisdom of the governor. Who if not she could perceive the true worth of a person, even if that person is a mutant?"

traits.locale_text: "Dürüst olmak gerekirse varlığından pek hazzetmiyorum {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Lakin valinin hikmetine de sual edecek değilim. Mutant olsun ya da olmasın, bir kişinin gerçek değerini valimizden daha iyi kim bilecek?"
